Parameters: String: The full url to the content that should be downloaded
String: the user agent to be used for the download.
String: Content-disposition http header, if present.
String: The mimetype of the content reported by the server
long: The file size reported by the server
onDownloadStart(java.lang.String,java.la.Description: Notify the host application that a file should be downloaded
onDownloadStart(java.lang.String,java.la.FullName: public abstract void onDownloadStart (String url, String userAgent, String contentDisposition, String mimetype, long contentLength)
